name: Adult Amethyst Dragon
movement: walk 40 ft., burrow 30 ft., fly 60 ft.
description: The Adult Amethyst Dragon possesses shimmering amethyst scales and sharp, powerful features. It exhibits a mystical aura, a strong presence, and keen intelligence, complemented by its mastery of psionic powers.
memorable: This dragon's ability to charm and manipulate enemies through its psionic powers and spells makes it a unique and formidable foe.
goals: The dragon seeks to dominate its surroundings and influence creatures for its purposes.
relations: Could be encountered alongside other dragons or psionically adept creatures.
environment: Typically found in mountainous regions or mystical areas rich in psychic energy.
strengths: Strong in both physical combat and telepathic manipulation, with notable resistances to force and psychic damage.
weaknesses: Reliance on telepathic powers can hinder its effectiveness when disrupted.
attacks: Multiattack with a bite and two claw strikes, as well as psionic abilities releasing waves of psychic damage.
most_powerful_ability: Concussive Breath, unleashing deadly force damage over a large area.
senses: Possesses keen senses with a passive perception score of 18.
skills: Highly skilled in deception and persuasion, making it adept at manipulating others.
additional_information: Legendary Resistance allows it to succeed on failed saving throws.
Far Thoughts grants awareness of creatures using psionics within 100 miles.
Innate spellcasting capabilities for spells like Charm Person and Modify Memory.
Utilizes reactions to control charmed creatures.
Has potent Legendary Actions to influence battles.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting with a focus on charm and memory manipulation spells.
